</title>

<traits>

<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 583 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** etched onto light armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Light seems to partially penetrate this armor.

<document level="2" id="action-182" />

**Craft Requirements** Supply one casting of _invisibility_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

name: Invisibility (Greater)
